name: test_e2e_with_logs[299_SSTI_VEL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSTI_VEL_001` |
| **Name** | Velocity template runtime execution |
| **Category** | SSTI |
| **Subcategory** | velocity |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `#set($runtime = $runtime.getRuntime())$runtime.exec('whoami')`
- **Encoded**: `%23set%28%24runtime%20%3D%20%24runtime.getRuntime%28%29%29%24runtime.exec%28%27whoami%27%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~12000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:24.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
